Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

<Old>
With another roar of challenge the great cat flexed his neck and back as he
opened great powerful jaws and, for a moment, exposing dark metallic teeth
which glinted in the light! Turning his neck and head he lunged downward to
bite down on the canine!

<NEW>

Trelos yelped as the Lion bit him on the neck, but instead of letting go, he
just bit down harder, trying to tear away whatever flesh or armor in that
spot.

OOC: A month delay, sorry about that.... Yes Trelos started in beast mode,
transformed to robot mode, then back into beast mode.  He's more comfortable
in beast mode, for some reason.  Ravenchief and Depthcharge have now
retreated and are en route to the nearby maximal base.

-Kraftlos

--0016e65c887206256f049ad2b3cc
